name: White Blade
description:
Setia is suddenly attacked while napping, and her precious magic crystal is stolen by unknown enemies.
Will she be able to retrieve her stolen crystal?



White Blade is a short turn-based strategy game, where players strategically consider the unique skills of both their own characters and enemies in order to defeat their opponents.



  • New skills that are added as the game progresses
  • Unique finishing strike illustrations for each skill
  • Various hints provided when the player is unable to progress
  • Special skills that enemies use only at the highest difficulty
  • 'Special Effect Combo' option that allows players to directly modify the combat system
  • Plus other features
